00024 #ifndef __MT_ABSTRACT_THREAD_POOL_H__
00025 #define __MT_ABSTRACT_THREAD_POOL_H__
00026 
00027 #include <vector>
00028 
00029 #include "sys/Thread.h"
00030 #include "mt/RequestQueue.h"
00031 #include "mt/ThreadPoolException.h"
00032 #include "mt/WorkerThread.h"
00033 
00034 namespace mt
00035 {
00048 template <typename Request_T> class AbstractThreadPool
00049 {
00050 public:
00051 
00056     AbstractThreadPool(unsigned short numThreads = 0) :
00057             mNumThreads(numThreads)
00058     {}
00059 
00060 
00062     virtual ~AbstractThreadPool()
00063     {
00064         destroy();
00065     }
00066 
00073     void start()
00074     {
00075         for (unsigned short i = 0; i < mNumThreads; i++)
00076         {
00077             WorkerThread<Request_T> *thread = newWorker();
00078             mPool.push_back(thread);
00079             mPool[i]->start();
00080         }
00081     }
00082 
00089     virtual WorkerThread<Request_T>* newWorker() = 0;
00090 
00097     void join()
00098     {
00099         for (unsigned short i = 0; i < mPool.size(); i++)
00100         {
00101             dbg_printf("mPool[%d]->join()\n", i);
00102             mPool[i]->join();
00103 
00104         }
00105         destroy();
00106 
00107 
00108     }
00109 
00110     void setNumThreads(unsigned short numThreads)
00111     {
00112         mNumThreads = numThreads;
00113     }
00114 
00115     void addRequest(Request_T &handler)
00116     {
00117         mRequestQueue.enqueue(handler);
00118     }
00119 
00124     size_t getNumThreads() const
00125     {
00126         return mPool.size();
00127     }
00128 
00129 protected:
00130 
00131     void destroy()
00132     {
00133         size_t size = mPool.size();
00134         for (unsigned short i = 0; i < size; i++)
00135         {
00136             sys::Thread *t = mPool.back();
00137             mPool.pop_back();
00138             delete t;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     unsigned short mNumThreads;
00143     std::vector<sys::Thread *> mPool;
00144     mt::RequestQueue<Request_T> mRequestQueue;
00145 };
00146 }
00147 
00148 #endif
